item.title: By: The Random Yak
item.dc:creator: The Random Yak
item.description:
Why is it the priests are always the oldest ones in the guild? (60 Troll priest, feathermoon, here, and at 30+ - won't tell you how much +, but I'm the oldest in my guild). Ditto from my EQ days - and I was the oldest then, too. Sad, I know.
But just to add to the entertainment value - my father in law plays too, and he HAS made the kind of comments you're talking about. Nothing, nothing on earth beats watching an argument between your kid and your father-in-law go from group, to guild, to general and then to yell. Awesome.
item.content:encoded:
Why is it the priests are always the oldest ones in the guild? (60 Troll priest, feathermoon, here, and at 30+ – won’t tell you how much +, but I’m the oldest in my guild). Ditto from my EQ days – and I was the oldest then, too. Sad, I know.

But just to add to the entertainment value – my father in law plays too, and he HAS made the kind of comments you’re talking about. Nothing, nothing on earth beats watching an argument between your kid and your father-in-law go from group, to guild, to general and then to yell. Awesome.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Haha. Ya, I leave general off too most of the time.
I've noticed the chatters have started to creep into the trade channel now. Probably caught on that no one was left in general anymore to hear every last detail about "how their day went".
item.content:encoded:
Haha. Ya, I leave general off too most of the time.

I’ve noticed the chatters have started to creep into the trade channel now. Probably caught on that no one was left in general anymore to hear every last detail about “how their day went”.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Great moments in Warcraft history:
11/23/2004 - /leave General
